name: Sytzo
description:
Sytzo is a short and minimal puzzler based on the theme of "The Elements". It was made for "The YouTuber Jam" (a very original name).

The game is inspired by the flash game "Fireboy and Watergirl", and it borrows a lot of elements from it, although I still introduce a lot of new ones!

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • R- Restart
  • Esc - Main Menu
